usage.brand_accent: Use #C41E3A for primary CTAs, active states, and key highlights only. Do not overuse.

buttons.primary: bg-[#C41E3A] text-white hover:bg-[#A01830] rounded-sm px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all hover:shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-black text-black hover:bg-black hover:text-white rounded-sm px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-black hover:text-[#C41E3A] font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide hover:bg-transparent

cards.service_card: group relative bg-white border border-border p-8 hover:border-[#C41E3A] transition-colors duration-300 flex flex-col justify-between h-full

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-input focus:border-[#C41E3A] focus:ring-[#C41E3A] rounded-sm

hero_background.alt: Modern glass architecture reflecting blue sky

general: Implement a 'Light Mode' dominant theme with strong Black/Red contrasts.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings to give a strong, industrial feel.
Ensure the 'Request Quote' (Anfrage) flow is prominent and accessible from all pages.
The 'Services' section should use a Bento Grid layout, not a simple list.
Use the provided image URLs for specific service cards.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states that incorporate the brand red (#C41E3A).

pages.home: Hero section must be bold with the slogan 'Glanz. Hygiene. Power.'. Use the 'Tetris' grid for the About section.
pages.services: Create a filterable grid for the 14 services.
pages.service_detail: Each detail page must have a sticky sidebar for 'Quick Request' or contact info.
pages.contact: Include a large, easy-to-read map and clear contact details.

accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1 for normal text.
All images must have alt text.
Interactive elements must be keyboard accessible.

universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs; prioritize unique layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use 'Inter' for headings; use the specified 'Barlow Condensed'.
All interactive elements must include data-testid attributes.
